name: browser_drag
description: Perform a drag and drop operation. Drags from a source element to a target element or coordinates.

sourceRef.description: Reference of the element to drag from

targetRef.description: Reference of the element to drop onto

targetX.description: X coordinate to drop at (relative to viewport). Use with targetY instead of targetRef for coordinate-based drops.

targetY.description: Y coordinate to drop at (relative to viewport). Use with targetX instead of targetRef for coordinate-based drops.

viewId.description: Target browser tab ID. If omitted, uses the last interacted tab.
